twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 | #8 - La Crimsona Begins (Blind Playthrough)

message.body: the audio balance is a bit off in places
is there a secret per-floor or is that table just for completeness?
you could have gone in the portal lol
there was a portal above to save to go back into the secret lol
I keep ruining my sleep schedule
using your social clout for evil
I normally have to sleep at around 9pm for work, but the night before last I was up til 2 am
the green ones are green apples and the orange ones are plausibly orange apples but what are the yellow ones
it's not ice physics it's air viscosity physics
Oh yeah that drop is arse.
Many ways to do taht and they're all kinda eh.
I think that's that across the rainbow skip that requires D-trick to be possible
ohhh that makes a lot of sense now lol, I didn't even notice when I played
putting an Evil one there would be too... Evil
This feels like some ocean Princess gimmick.
I played Pickory and There's No Getting Used To It
Someone played Best Guy and thought wait this is a good idea!
I think we're all guessing here
Im at work so i cant stay, wanted to say gl and glad i caught the end of my stage :)
There's a secret per tileset or one per screen?
got the air ex crystal but it wasn't too hard when you know where the spikes are
lol nah you can go back
the hard part is figuring out where the spikes are behind the wall
yeah i asked for it back in april apparently lol
didn't think i'd be stuck on justice for so long
but the bad part is *really* bad without canceling
i'd say every screen in ex is actually pretty cool, but they all manage to have just one really ass jump
hope the end of looks alright mainly cause the ass jump gets out of the way early
without it, it's just as dumpster tier as the rest
starter always looked pretty fun to me but the rest has 0 appeal to me
yeah hades i actually kinda like despite clearly being 1 frame hell just cause it's very appropriate for hades
yeah it's just long save with a timer
it's pretty long, cause 4 screens y'know, but it's cool
Hi Wolfie, any mysteries uncovered today?
Oh hi zurai, haven't seen you in ages zurairHmm
Just so you play blind, but not folded.
left side in the drop is also nothing fake?
well detective zurai is at his wits end
detective zurai is about to have his badge revoked
I guess zuzu is no Columbo.....
clearly you need to go from the ledge to keep your djump
You gotta do it, for McGarnagle
get a needle tool out and check the jump
I'm trying to eat lunch here
thats what his youtube video says
you can try getting the align on the left side of the block you stand on, but keeping it seems hard
I watched the vod, congrats Wolfie
it looked extremely brutal from what I sawq
found any more secrets since then?
I havent seen lemon's stage yet
Have you tried asking Kale to remove the wall for you?
you actually already have the align if you dont touch the wall at the 16px landing
the solution is to use cheatengine
its one of those puzzles that requires external resources
if you're not sure if the jump is possible cant you jtool it to check
damn i thought it was gonna do the vandal neckcrack
honestly missed opportunity there to use the kid looking down sprite
with visuals like these it has to be plasma
@Pieceofcheese87 I was thinking the exact same lol
this can only be the work of Yon Siper
the trees are impressive to me
the shadows through the tree branches too...
that said I have not played this stage yet so I think I'll bid adieu
wolfi i know what you said but it sounded so much like "obscurely autistic"
this really is the farewell medley of crimson needles
why are there chocolate chip cookie particles
I see them, they're very faint in the bg

It's ok, but have you watched the series The Simpsons, the episode lust for fat Homer :D it features the whole Simpsons family, i.e. Bart simpsons, Homer's son, fans can laugh and it's sure to laugh, even if Homer's fat is fat and other things :  D it's worth watching it quickly

Greetings. It is I, Dave. Pleasure to meet you. Oh, I am sorry, were you expecting a save point here? My apologies. My appearance is very similiar to a save point, but I am actually just Dave. I have no special properties, nor can you use me to save your game like at a save point. Alas all I can do is sit here and talk. I wish I had legs so I could jump around like you, that would be fun. I do not like it here very much. It is cold. Hey, that is a cool costume you have on. You are like a funky l
@gwiz609 Spider pig, spider pig! Does whatever a spider pig does! Can he swing from a web? No he can't, he's a pig! Look out! Here comes the spider pig! :D
i've only seen little bits of this game. How is it? rays3
I just made a big bowl of super spicy ramen
with a ton of garlic, sriracha, ghost pepper, and carolina reaper
if you like strong stuff then why didn't you have any of the purple dragon at ESA?
because he was busy putting in noise complaints while u did that a floor above him...
you don't need the guts for it, you just need the liver
Purple Dragon? raysT You have my curiousity
legend says every sip shaves a month off your life
this is my last year alive
it was nice knowing you my friend
fuck yeah dodge those insanely smooth rounded rocks
the Kid's gonna feel that one in the morning
they had a really sold engineer on the job there
only one stage has Goblin Mode though
this level is pretty hefty, we could even say it's got some chonk.
this is some bonkers movement tech
Honestly, novel mechanics is a much better approach to increasing difficulty as it leaves room for consistency (bigger gaps etc.)
you have let me down wolfiexe...
"wolfie has yet to die in this entire game"
god spoke those words on the eighth day
gwiz told me to tell youre sucking ass rn
believe what you want to believe...
